item.title: I need HELP deleting objects
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Okay so this is all I have right here

public void deleteObject(int objectX, int objectY)

            {


	outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60);
	outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8));
	outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8));
	/*DELETE OBJECT*/
	outStream.writeByte(101);
	outStream.writeByteC(0);
	outStream.writeByte(0);
            }

Replace it with yours?

Read full topic

item.title: I need HELP deleting objects
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Add this:

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10); } public void Deleteobjects() { deletethatobject(xcoord, ycoord); }

Change xcoord and ycoord to the Coords where the object you want to be deleted.

and in case 121: add

Deleteobjects();

So it would look like:

public void deletethatobject(int objectX, int objectY) { ReplaceObject2(objectX, objectY, 6951, -1, 10); } public void Deleteobjects() { deletethatobject(4312, 1243); }

Read full topic
